pullRequest.title: Updated materials editor
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: #7847
Description:

added a switch binded to auto_update for scm fields - defaulted the value to true
added a switch binded to ignore_for_scheduling for dependency material - default value false

commit.message:
Updated materials editor

 - added a switch binded to `auto_update` for scm fields - defaulted the value to true
 - added a switch binded to `ignore_for_scheduling` for dependency material - default value false

beforeCommit.message:
Updated materials editor

 - added a switch binded to `auto_update` for scm fields - defaulted the value to true
 - added a switch binded to `ignore_for_scheduling` for dependency material - default value false

afterCommit.message:
Updated materials editor

 - added a switch binded to `auto_update` for scm fields - defaulted the value to true
 - added a switch binded to `ignore_for_scheduling` for dependency material - default value false

nodes.bodyText: I like this -- tests are more resilient and it communicates intent. 👍
